title: Bacon-Wrapped Pineapple
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. Cut the bacon strips in half. Wrap each pineapple cube with a half slice of bacon and lay on the baking sheet, seam side down.
3. Whisk the maple syrup and mustard together until well combined.
4. Brush each pineapple cube with the maple mustard. Spear each cube with a toothpick if desired.
5. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until golden brown and crisp.
